sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating>5</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>Thin, metallic wires turn standard insulated gauntlets into shock gloves. Martial artists can use them to augment their brutal hand attacks, and more than a few nefarious rogues have been known to "seal a deal" with a handshake that leaves a rival convulsing on the floor.   Models Include: Corellian Personal Defence X-21.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points>1</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Shock Gloves</name> <number>GEAR0001023</number> <price>300</price> <range>engaged</range> <rarity>2</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Brawl (Br)">72705d5cdbae88542901de90cf9619f1</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 15:29:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a0bc6aec2f10a450e0f497eef699b6c2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 15:29:28</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
